title: The history of the English and Scotch presbytery wherein is discovered their designs and practices for the subversion of government in church and state / written in French, by an eminent divine of the Reformed church, and now Englished.
author: Basier, Isaac, 1607-1676.
notes: Attributed to Isaac Basier.  Cf. DNB and Biblioth√®que nat. cat.
